BRACKET_OVERCLOSING.MESSAGE: Too much brackets has been closed or has been closed before a bracket were opened.

MISSING_CONNECTOR.MESSAGE: It seems, you forgot some connector between your statements inside your logic expression.

MISSING_STATEMENT_INSIDE.MESSAGE: It seems, you forgot some statements inside your logic expression.

MISSING_STATEMENT_AT_THE_END.MESSAGE: It seems, you forgot some statements at the end of your expression.
